assertion: My dad once broke my leg during a particularly vigorous bout of gargalesis.
For the past fifteen years, I have performed my own dentistry.
He came to my rescue when I once got stuck in a tree.
He once booked me to sing 'Happy Birthday' to his tortoise.
He is the locksmith who came to rescue my locksmith after that locksmith got locked out of his van.
On route to a meeting at the BBC, I gave CPR to an OAP.
